display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3JN3tBaIk6wQ7kNvwHciZI7&_nc_oc=Adman9AAIO3VWADpE2XzdyrczcCm1xWi9gjzAXq-38AoYeirEdEuP0sj3llD5FoTY5Q&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfkeKV1ihB9YkJZ5q5CtEV3DCTqaCjjYmhfXpbwsJVeWSQ&oe=6959E02A)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vKJOcIVrGUsQ7kNvwFzrbqQ&_nc_oc=Adkl_10lXq_kvmGd3FNqDHU4sXvoo_WW8gG6IqL9XMXFr0iBd1O9ewr7H-7hINGMgDM&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfnNoMW-WlpjYfpahukwy4q5Podrv9xDzyPLD6_RJ1oNow&oe=695A08D2)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=w3mD1VBmpRYQ7kNvwEM9jEq&_nc_oc=AdnaYxrS--vnSXJ8uM4RlYmtYEwdhmtP8ggIIy7fhh0X3cuNssKwBWwx9jI89nPWeZE&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afl3KOqzYmxg6CajId5ZLxMy3_2vfpDOy1ywGD7s4faYGw&oe=695A0FAD)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5aIWxIZ3kZwQ7kNvwHg_N1J&_nc_oc=AdmPGsVX8n99XLYaF4z70fsI89VBcYa42N3KLaG7L8v8kRMUlqjPrIatCT9tn8T2YT8&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfkMpkEXCXN_ljmqTtmoqtZPzjK-BwdILCC2NxslwCMmFw&oe=6959EBD0)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57566682_1730682357765277_5286327356836676334_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Rp_sJHrFi5YQ7kNvwEa9sAX&_nc_oc=AdkyeOPABB1iIka2pblmkUDCn96JMNRUz76v6wsz8zj6RTA1Z2RVPFXOjqyyzJV0PD0&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afl7rGGpQKahBX7d4_7wzHodcmSh4P5pEJjJ8Xtnv1jexw&oe=6959E023)
